definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
surname Long/short for 吉隆坡[Ji2 long2 po1], Kuala Lumpur
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: But it has already become a must-see site for tourists when they arrive in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 但多年来早已成为观光客到巴塞隆纳必经之地。

sentences.english: She was lovely and told me that I could buy them in a shop in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 她很亲切并且告诉我在巴塞隆纳可以买到小布的商店。

sentences.english: On Friday, the ship will return to Barcelona, Spain, as scheduled.
sentences.chinese: 周五邮轮将按照原订计画回到西班牙巴塞隆纳。

definition: (Tw) San Diego, California/Santiago, capital of Chile
Copenhagen or København, capital of Denmark
Abu Dhabi, capital of United Arab Emirates (Tw)

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Da4 gong1 guo2
